title: Shopify/Shopify Plus Full-Stack Developer
description:
Newthink is a boutique Shopify / Shopify Plus agency located in Los Angeles. We are looking for an experienced Shopify / Shopify Plus developer to join our small team.

We want to find someone who is interested in joining a growing team and taking a leadership position. We are excited about Shopify and Shopify Plus and the surrounding technologies and want to find someone who shares that excitement.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain Shopify and Shopify Plus stores.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including a UI/UX designer, to implement design and technical requirements.
* Write efficient, reusable, and reliable code
* Test, troubleshoot, and debug applications to optimize performance and reliability
* Estimate and prioritize workload, set timelines, assign tasks to team members
* Participate in code reviews to identify potential issues and share best practices
* Participate in client calls as a tech resource

**Requirements:**

* Advanced knowledge of and experience with Shopify/Shopify Plus
* Advanced knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
* Intermediate knowledge of JavaScript libraries (Alpine, VueJS, Nuxt, NodeJs, Webpack, jQuery)
* Experience with code versioning tools such as Git
* Experience with Shopify APIs and app integration
* Knowledge of latest Shopify features including Functions, Checkout Extensions, Metaobjects, etc.

**Nice to have:**

* Experience with headless commerce and Hydrogen
* Experience building custom Shopify apps
* Experience with TailwindCSS

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Expected hours: 20 – 40 per week

Schedule:

* 4 hour shift
* 8 hour shift
* Choose your own hours
* Monday to Friday
* On call

Application Question(s):

* Are you located within the United States?

Experience:

* Shopify Plus: 2 years (Required)

Language:

* English (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Full Stack Laravel Developer
description:
Join a company whose mission is to support modern businesses in their quest to grow fast and flexibly. We achieve this by offering innovative services, delivered by a skilled, talented, and distributed team.

Alliance is seeking a skilled Full Stack Laravel Developer to join our team of innovative developers and designers. The ideal candidate is a talented developer with extensive technical experience in Laravel who can work collaboratively within a team as well as independently. You will primarily focus on developing robust solutions using Laravel that empower our clients with flexible work options. Our experienced engineers are dedicated to creating solutions that help other business adapt and succeed in their industries.

Alliance values honesty, transparency, trust, and integrity, and we expect the same from our team members. These principles are fundamental to the growth and success of every individual on our team, and we work together diligently to uphold them.

**Tech Stack**

* Laravel
* Node.js
* Vue
* React
* Azure
* GitHub

**Skills/Traits That Will Contribute to Your Success**

* 10+ years of experience building and deploying successful Laravel applications.
* Proficiency in PHP and familiarity with JavaScript/TypeScript.
* Experience integrating third-party APIs into Laravel applications.
* Knowledge of building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines, preferably using GitHub Actions.
* Familiarity with multiple databases, such as MySQL and Azure Cosmos DB.
* An entrepreneurial mindset and a commitment to lifelong learning.

If you're passionate about Laravel, eager to learn, and willing to put in the effort, we encourage you to apply.

Candidates should include their GitHub repo (if available) and a list of recent programming/technical books/blogs/websites they have engaged with.

**Full Stack Laravel Developer Responsibilities:**

* Developing back-end server applications using Laravel.
* Ensuring the responsiveness of applications.
* Seeing projects through from conception to finished product.
* Designing and developing APIs within Laravel.
* Meeting both technical requirements and consumer needs.
* Staying informed about advancements in Laravel and related technologies.

**Full Stack Laravel Developer Requirements:**

* Extensive experience as a backend engineer specializing in Laravel.
* Proficiency in Node.js, PHP, and Git/GitHub.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms like Microsoft Azure.
* Knowledge of modern web security best practices, including OWASP.
* Understanding of data privacy controls, such as PII and GDPR.
* Strong verbal communication skills and problem-solving abilities.
* Attention to detail in all aspects of development.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $120,000.00 - $150,000.00 per year

Benefits:

* Dental insurance
* Health insurance
* Life insurance
* Paid time off
* Vision insurance

Experience level:

* 10 years

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Education:

* Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

* Laravel: 10 years (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Senior Full Stack Software Developer
description:
**\\*\\*Company Description:\\*\\*** 

Top Tutors For Us is a pioneering organization committed to designing educational programs and curriculums tailored for underserved school districts. Our mission is to bridge the educational gap through innovative solutions, complemented by supplementary private tutoring services.

\\*\\*Job Description:\\*\\*

Are you a seasoned Full Stack Developer seeking a dynamic opportunity in an agile startup environment? Join our team at Top Tutors For Us where you will contribute to the advancement of our cutting-edge technology platform, driving impactful change in education. As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will collaborate closely with our product team to enhance our service, ensuring an optimal experience for our highly engaged students and tutors.

Our current tech stack includes ReactJS, Springboot Java, MySQL. We are seeking a proficient Full Stack Developer to bolster our engineering team. Your responsibilities will encompass the development of new features, resolution of bugs, and enhancement of devops infrastructure to facilitate weekly releases and elevate user satisfaction. Moreover, you will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in best practices for product architecture, design, and development.

- Troubleshoot and resolve bugs and issues reported by team members and users.

- Engage in projects aimed at mastering best practices in product architecture, design, and development.

\\*\\*Key Requirements:\\*\\*

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; or equivalent work experience.

- Minimum of five years of professional experience in software development, with a focus on full-stack web development.

- Expertise in building and maintaining scalable, high-performance web applications.

- Proficiency in Node.js, AngularJS, or React, along with a solid understanding of related technologies and frameworks.

- Strong understanding of software development best practices, design patterns, and architectural principles.

- Experience with agile methodologies and tools such as Git, Jira, or similar.

- Proven ability to mentor junior developers, conduct code reviews, and provide technical guidance.

- Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

- Demonstrated capacity for problem-solving, critical thinking, and decision-making in a fast-paced environment.

title: Power BI Developer (Software Visualization)
description:
NikSoft Systems Corporation is a recognized Information Technology solutions provider. Founded in 1998 and based in Reston, Virginia, NikSoft is a CMMI Level 3 Certified company with an established reputation for excellence and on-time delivery with a consistently high customer satisfaction rating from its Federal Government and private consulting partners.


NikSoft is currently looking for a **Power BI Developer** to join our federal client's Enterprise Analytics team. The successful candidate will develop Business Intelligence solutions in an unparalleled large-scale enterprise environment with 100+ data sources churning out over 1.3 billion transactions per day (over 40k per second!), where nearly 35 Petabytes of data are housed and the use of super-computers and in-memory databases are needed to process and support 100s of mission-critical business applications. Join the NikSoft team and take your career to the next level.

 **Responsibilities**:

* Develop BI solutions using the Microsoft Power BI product in support of a fast-paced and dynamic Business Intelligence solutions group.
* Provide end-to-end technical expertise and knowledge in support of architecture, design, development, and security using the Power BI product.
* Support overall project implementation of large volume applications in Power BI, leveraging product-specific design patterns specifically designed to support datasets with hundreds of millions of records.
* Communicate effectively at all levels of the organization, in both written and oral formats.
* Primarily responsible for designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining dashboards and reports.
* Works with stakeholders to identify trends, aggregate data and build visually appealing reports in Microsoft Power BI
* Able to apply data visualization best practices to construct, steward, curate, and leverage end-to-end digital content for programmatic dashboards.

 **Required Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related Information Technology discipline.
* 5+ years of IT experience with 3+ years of hands-on experience developing visualization solutions using the Power BI product.
* Experience in Data Visualizations and dashboard development - Power BI UX, data modeling, and ETL.
* Experience in chart functions such as aggregations, ranking and set analysis.
* Understanding of Big Data and strategies for good problem-solving and communication skills
* Knowledge of full Power BI tools suite - Power BI desktop, Power BI report server, Power Apps, Power BI report Builder, Power BI Gateways, Power BI Embedded, and Power BI mobile.

 **\\*\\*\\*\\*Candidates must be able to obtain a Postal Sensitive Clearance (US Citizenship or Green Card required). Additionally, candidates must not have traveled outside of the USA for a combined period not to exceed 6 months within the last 5 years.\\*\\*\\***

title: Jr/Mid. API Developer
description:
Description:

We are seeking a Junior or Mid-level API Developer with robust programming skills in JavaScript with extensive knowledge of AWS cloud infrastructure to help enhance our application's functionality. This role will work closely with a seasoned Technical Lead and involves collaboration with cloud architects and front-end developers. The developer will be responsible for managing the full API


lifecycle within the AWS ecosystem, ensuring optimal performance, robust security, and high availability.

**Responsibilities:**

* Design and implement secure, scalable, and maintainable APIs optimized for AWS cloud infrastructure to ensure seamless integration and dynamic front-end functionality for the application.
* Collaborate with cloud architects and front-end developers to create clear APIs that conform to AWS best practices and application architectural requirements.
* Develop and maintain comprehensive API documentation using AWS tools such as Amazon API Gateway, Swagger Importer, or AWS Developer Portal for easy access by internal and external stakeholders.
* Manage the full API lifecycle within the AWS ecosystem, utilizing services like AWS Lambda for serverless APIs, and monitoring through Amazon CloudWatch.
* Optimize API performance through regular testing and performance tuning, leveraging AWS elastic capabilities to ensure high availability and scalability.
* Implement robust API security measures using AWS IAM (Identity and Access Management) and apply best practices for secure API gateway configurations.
* Diagnose and address API-related technical issues, ensuring quick resolution and minimal disruption, using AWS support and troubleshooting tools.
* Iterate on existing APIs in response to user feedback, application updates, and evolving AWS services that can enhance functionality.
* Utilize AWS monitoring services to track API usage, identify performance bottlenecks, and inform decisions on infrastructure and feature improvements.
* Facilitate effective teamwork across product, design, and development teams to ensure consistent user experience and API reliability in a cloud-native environment.
* Conduct code reviews within Git repositories, ensuring adherence to cloud development best practices and high-quality standards.
* Promote API best practices within the organization, encouraging their strategic use to leverage AWS's full potential and improve application performance.
* Work closely with the Solutions Architecture team to ensure APIs contribute to a coherent, cloud-native ecosystem, aligning with AWS architectural best practices and the application’s strategic direction.


Requirements:
* A Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a closely related discipline is required.
* A minimum of 2 years of experience demonstrating a track record of success in software development for sophisticated applications in large-scale production environments.
* Demonstrable NodeJS development experience.
* Strong communication abilities, with proficiency in articulating complex concepts clearly and persuasively, both in writing and verbally.
* Consistent in delivering results, demonstrating thorough follow-through on tasks and initiatives.
* Self-directed with a proven ability to take the initiative and drive tasks to completion without the need for continual guidance.
* Strong organizational skills with demonstrated aptitude in balancing multiple tasks and priorities, managing time effectively across various client engagements.
* Adaptable and agile, with a demonstrated ability to transition smoothly between projects,
* Maintaining high productivity and responsiveness to changing business needs.

**Valued Skills and Experience:**

* Prior experience with federal government projects is highly regarded and will be considered an asset.
* Demonstrated proficiency in NodeJS, TypeScript, and JavaScript, with a strong foundation in coding principles and design patterns.
* Experience with serverless architectures, particularly within the AWS ecosystem, including but not limited to Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFormation, S3, SNS, and SQS is preferred.
* Familiarity with Elastic Search and the ability to design and implement search-driven solutions is a plus.
* Prior experience with test-driven development, particularly utilizing Mocha/Chai for comprehensive unit and integration tests, is preferred.
* Experience or familiarity with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) methodologies, with a preference for candidates who have worked with leading CI/CD tools.
* Comprehensive understanding of Agile and Scrum practices, with the ability to facilitate sprints, manage stories, and drive development within this framework.
* A relentless drive to understand, maintain, and improve complex systems, ensuring their reliability and efficiency.
* An innate collaborative spirit, thriving in a team setting where joint brainstorming, pair programming, and peer review are regular practices.
* An unwavering commitment to personal growth, always seeking to sharpen skills and embrace feedback to exceed the highest standards of development excellence.

**Additional Information:**

* In order to meet the clearance requirements for this opportunity, candidates must be **authorized to work in the US.**
* All candidates will be subject to a complete background check to include, but not limited to Criminal History, Education Verification, Professional Certification Verification, Verification of Previous Employment and Credit History.
* Public Trust background investigations can take approximately four to eight weeks and requires fingerprinting.

**Other Information:**

* The salary for this position is **$80,000 - $115,000** annually
* For information on SFI's benefits please visit http://www.spatialfront.com/pages/career.html
* This is a full-time W2 position.
* Please no agencies, third parties, or corp-to-corp.
* Spatial Front Inc. is an Equal-opportunity Employer, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
* Spatial Front Inc. participates in E-Verify.

title: Scala Developer
description:
**Role Description/Responsibilities:**

Design, develop and test custom software solutions across multiple system components or applications. Create implementation or integration approach for applications and components. Translate system requirements into design specifications. Provide primary support for installation of application releases into production. Design and code applications in line with programming standards and interface specifications.

At Accenture, our Software Developers design, develop, and configure software systems to meet market and/or client requirements either end-to-end from analysis, design, implementation, quality assurance (including testing), to delivery and maintenance of the software product or system or for a specific phase of the lifecycle. A Software Engineering Specialist will:

* Apply knowledge of technologies, applications, methodologies, processes, and tools to support a client, project, or entity.
* Build and develop according to technical design.
* Work with Business Analysts team to identify design gaps and functionality improvements.
* Develop Java/Scala based REST APIs based on technical designs.
* Produce estimates for new functionality or enhancements.
* Create and execute unit tests for developed components.
* Troubleshoot different environments including production for development issues.

**Skills:**

* 3+ years of experience with Java Development.
* 2+ years of experience with Scala
* Provide functional and/or technical expertise to plan, analyze, define, and support the delivery of future functional and technical capabilities for an application or group of applications.
* Assist in facilitating impact assessment efforts and in producing and reviewing estimates for client work requests.
* Understand what NoSQL databases are; hands-on experience is a plus.
* Trained in the following: Java, JavaScript, REST, Gradle,
* Basic understanding of Agile development methodology and AWS environment.
* Ability to analyze logs; Splunk familiarity is a plus
* Ability to perform in high pressure environment and under strict deadlines.
* Ability to adapt to quickly changing priorities.
* Java – Advanced Proficency
* JavaScript – Advanced Proficency
* Amazon Web Services (AWS) – Beginner
* Splunk – Beginner
* Scala – Intermediate

title: Software Developer
description:
**Software Developer**


RSA Conference™ is the premier series of global events and year-round learning for the cybersecurity community. RSAC is where the security industry converges to discuss current and future concerns and have access to the experts, unbiased content and ideas that help enable individuals and companies advance their cybersecurity posture and build stronger and smarter teams. Both in-person and online, RSAC brings the cybersecurity industry together and empowers the collective “we” to stand against cyberthreats around the world. RSAC is the ultimate marketplace for the latest technologies and hands-on educational opportunities that help industry professionals discover how to make their companies more secure while showcasing the most enterprising, influential and thought-provoking thinkers and leaders in cybersecurity today.


As part of this evolution, RSAC seeks a Software Developer responsible for designing, developing, and implementing software applications based on business requirements. They contribute in a team of programmers to code services and applications that delight our customers. The Software Developer will meet our standards for maintainability by writing useful documentation, setting and enforcing coding standards, achieving optimal test coverage, automating builds and deployments, and establishing monitoring and alarms.


In this role you will:

* Develop Software Applications Based on Business Requirements: As a skilled software developer, you will be tasked with creating robust and efficient software applications tailored to meet specific business needs. Your role involves translating intricate business requirements into functional and user-friendly software solutions. Through a deep understanding of programming languages and technologies, you craft software that aligns seamlessly with the unique demands of each project.
* Maintain Software Applications and Implementing Enhancements: Beyond the initial development phase, you play a crucial role in the software’s lifecycle. This includes maintaining applications to ensure they function optimally, addressing any bugs or issues that may arise, and making enhancements in line with evolving project specifications. Your expertise is vital in guaranteeing the long-term effectiveness and relevance of the software.
* Support Project Planning and Scheduling: Collaborating closely with the project manager, you assist in the development of comprehensive project plans and schedules. Your insights and technical expertise are invaluable in creating realistic timelines and resource allocations. By providing support in project planning, you contribute to the efficient execution of tasks and the successful completion of projects within established deadlines.
* Participate in End-to-End Development Activities: Engaging in the entire software development lifecycle, you participate in diverse activities ranging from requirement analysis and design to development, rigorous testing, and eventual implementation. Your involvement ensures a holistic approach to software creation, where you meticulously analyze requirements, architect innovative solutions, rigorously test for quality assurance, and finally, implement the software, guaranteeing a seamless user experience.


Your profile:

* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering/Computer Science or Related Field
* Excellent Communication Skills: Effective written and oral communication skills are paramount in the realm of software development. You excel in articulating complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
* Strong Organizational Skills: Your strong organizational skills enable you to manage multiple tasks, prioritize effectively, and meet deadlines without compromising the quality of work.
* Strong Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: Armed with strong analytical prowess, you excel in dissecting complex problems, identifying key issues, and formulating effective solutions.
* Proven Experience in High-Level Programming Languages: Your proven expertise in high-level programming languages, such as Java and JavaScript, underscores your proficiency in crafting intricate and efficient code.
* Proven Experience in Software Development Methodologies: With a wealth of experience in software development methodologies, you possess a deep understanding of structured approaches to software engineering. Whether you follow Agile, Scrum, or other methodologies, your familiarity ensures that projects progress smoothly.
* Full-Stack Development Experience: Your track record includes successfully building complex web systems, showcasing your ability to architect sophisticated, scalable, and secure online platforms. You have experience designing maintainable APIs and are comfortable working in back end, web client, and mobile client code.
* Experience Configuring and Managing Cloud Infrastructure: You have worked in Azure or AWS cloud infrastructure environments optimized for high availability, scalability, and security. You manage configuration as code and take advantage of automation where appropriate.


Benefits


RSAC believes in investing in our people. We offer:

* Competitive salary, benefits, and perks for all full-time employees
* Employer-subsidized medical, dental and vision insurance
* 401K retirement employer match
* Home office equipment stipend and monthly technology stipend
* Thirteen paid holidays per calendar year
* Unlimited personal time off
* Annual employee bonus dependent upon overall company and personal performance
* Annual company-wide offsite


Our Culture


We believe that our differences make us stronger, and we are committed to fostering a culture of respect, empathy, and understanding.

* We are a fully remote team operating across the United States, giving our employees the flexibility to work from wherever they choose.
* Our team is passionate and results-oriented, striving to achieve excellence in everything we do.
* We strongly believe in creating an inclusive environment that values diversity and encourages our team members to share their unique perspectives.
* We recognize that by collaborating and working together, we can achieve our goals faster and more effectively.


Why RSAC?


The RSAC team takes great pride in helping shape the future of cybersecurity and being part of an expansive global community! We're always looking for imaginative and visionary individuals who share our passion for providing cutting-edge programs that equip cybersecurity practitioners worldwide with the intel and knowledge they need to thrive and safeguard organizations against cyberthreats.


Our Values

* Adaptability: In our ever-changing world, we innovate through determination, creativity and resourcefulness.
* Community: We bring people together and build trust by embracing the unique thoughts and perspectives of others with kindness and respect.
* Excellence: Because we are where the world talks security, we have the highest expectations of ourselves and our partners.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
**Job Title: SENIOR FRONTEND ENGINEER**

**About Us:**


First Stop Health provides Care that People Love® with our convenient, high-quality, and confidential virtual care solutions – Telemedicine, Virtual Mental Health and Virtual Primary Care. We help our patients save time and money through compassionate care that’s available 24/7 via app, website, or phone.


First Stop Health offers a comprehensive benefits package that includes various health and medical coverage options, dental and vision coverage, disability, and life coverage, making healthcare easily accessible. For those that choose to waive medical coverage a monthly medical waiver allowance will be provided.


First Stop Health offers a remote-first work environment and flexible paid time off, including Summer Fridays. Furthermore, the employer match 401k plan and monthly phone stipend demonstrate the company's commitment to employee financial well-being. The FSH membership benefit is another added perk for employees and provides Virtual Urgent Care, Virtual Mental Health, and Virtual Primary Care from their very first day!

**Job Description:**


First Stop Health is seeking an experienced, innovative and detail oriented Senior Frontend React who will design and develop the React frontend of our web applications.


As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will take ownership of and continue the migration of the FSH web application to a React frontend. You will work with backend engineers to architect and coordinate web services to provide a best-in-class application that provides Care that People Love®.


The ideal candidate will be an enthusiastic, service focused, detail oriented, self-starter that can iterate, create and define user-facing react applications and improve existing application architecture and design.

**Responsibilities:**

* Maintain and expand use of React across FSH web application portals (member, doctor, client, and admin)
* Improve code sharing of code where possible through DRY techniques and shared library
* Design and documentation of novel solutions to complex problems
* Maintain and improve processes by following standards, policies and procedures, as well as recommending new approaches
* Collaborate with backend engineers to strategize and architect API functionality.
* Troubleshoot and diagnose issues in a timely manner to continually improve application quality and performance
* Stay informed on related industry trends, news stories and the competitive landscape

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor’s degree preferred
* 3 years business experience
* Excellent understanding of React and Typescript concepts (virtual DOM, unidirectional data flow, components)
* Experience with legacy JavaScript and template languages
* Data Access Layer management via Redux, MobX, or equivalent


· Familiarity with common control libraries · Adept at dependency management

* Proficiency creating and consuming API Specifications
* Familiarity with mobile/script unit test frameworks
* Understanding of CSS and UI design concepts
* Fluent with Git and Github for version control
* Experience with Unit Testing
* Experience with Docker
* Familiarity with Atlassian Suite or equivalent
* Healthcare industry experience preferred, especially in telemedicine, advocacy or wellness
* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills
* Excellent organizational, interpersonal, quantitative, and analytical skills
* Ability to work independently in a deadline-oriented environment

**In the first 30 days you will:**


Participate in appropriate SCRUM meetings such as standup, planning, retrospectives, etc. Provide meaningful feedback in code review setting. Work with team to build new features independently. Demonstrate the ability to take work assignments, estimate them appropriately, and complete them with appropriate documentation and unit tests as appropriate.

**In the first 90 days you will:**


Demonstrate proficiency testing application changes and troubleshooting device specific defects. Acquire an awareness of current state of React application in the FSH web properties. Accurately estimate work items and provide a positive experience engineering new solutions to novel problems.


FSH is committed to diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging. Research shows that women, people of color and other historically underrepresented groups tend to only apply to jobs in which they meet all of the job requirements. Unsure if you check every box? Apply. We’d love to consider your unique experiences and how you could make First Stop Health even better.


To learn more about First Stop Health, visit www.fshealth.com.

title: Web Developer
description:
Do you want to be part of creating a better experience where you live, work and play? Why not grow with a company where you are not just an employee, but where you can be an owner?


Our company: Founded in 1948, Eagle Communications is a Kansas based media company. The company operates 31 radio stations in Kansas, Nebraska, and Missouri. In addition to radio, the company offers online solutions, web development, video production and creative services- All to support the communities we serve to grow and remain vibrant.


Our Digital Team is seeking an experienced **WordPress** **Web Developer** to work remotely within our company footprint.


This role is responsible for bringing the web design vision to life by developing WordPress websites and ensuring clear communication with colleagues and clients. You'll manage static sites with Github and Netlify and enhance WordPress sites with new features tailored to client needs and strive to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.

**Duties will include but are not limited to:**

* Develop WordPress websites designed by the design team
* Exercise regular communication with coworkers, business owners and project managers
* Manage Static Sites using Github and Netlify
* Manage and build new features for WordPress sites for our clients depending on their unique needs

* WordPress
* Familiar with industry-standard design tools
* Some experience with Figma/Sketch (or another prototyping design tool)
* Preferred: Experience with Divi

**Compensation:**  

Compensation is commensurate with experience along with a competitive benefits package including health insurance, 401(k), paid vacation and Employee Stock Ownership Plan.

Applications will be accepted until the position is filled. The selected candidate will be required to pass a criminal history background check and motor vehicle check. Eagle Communications is an Employee-Owned company and an EEO employer.

title: Front End Developer
description:
**Spaero is looking for a talented Frontend Developer to contract with our growing team.**

Biological products are transforming what we eat, what we wear, how and *how long* we live. Automation can supercharge the rate of discovering these game changing products. However, existing lab robots lack the software tools that scientists need to quickly and easily scale biological product development. That’s where we come in.

Spaero builds a software system that empowers scientists to dramatically scale the rate of biological product discovery by enabling fast and flexible lab automation.

We are backed by top tier investors and our experienced team is led by repeat founder Mitch Adler, who co-founded autonomous aerospace company Skyryse and was the first employee at industrial robotics software company Symbio Robotics.

**About the role**

This is a 6 month contract role to assist a small startup as we execute on our product roadmap. Your primary role is to deliver the user-facing experience for our product. You should have a user-centric, detail-oriented approach. Most importantly, you can independently solve complex engineering problems and can drive tangible results in a short time frame in a team oriented culture. This role is located in the office 2x per week in Boston or San Francisco.

**We have**

* A flexible, remote or hybrid work environment with offices in San Francisco and Boston
* A team of talented individuals with clear and kind communications skills
* A high bar for quality and commitment to open-mindedness and personal growth

**You have**

* 3+ years of professional frontend engineering experience developing interactive web applications, preferably geared toward an enterprise user.
* A B.S or M.S. in Computer Science or similar
* Strong expertise in the building and deploying web applications or interactive sites using React.
* Strong experience with test driven development environments
* A bias toward action with an openness to constructive collaboration and feedback
* A highly structured mindset with a strong focus on driving outcomes and translating data into actionable insights
* World-class written and verbal communication skills.
* The ability to operate independently with stakeholders and manage relationships, deliverables, and timelines with minimal supervision.

**What you'll do**

* Build our user experience from the ground up
* Work closely with the design team, product management and engineering to translate early ideas into interactive prototypes
* Engage with customers as needed to identify problems, A|B test solutions, and refine workflows
* Work cross-functionally to fully develop our user interface, ultimately driving increased value to our users and our business

**Salary:** $70-$120 per hour based on experience and expertise

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $70.00 - $120.00 per hour

Experience level:

* 3 years
* 4 years

Experience:

* Front-end development: 3 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

title: iOS Developer
description:
The Mobile Specialist participates in project planning, including resource estimation, and in the creation and review of technical deliverables. The Mobile Specialist works in conjunction with other technical team members in all phases of the Agile Scrum SDLC.

This position will participate as a key technical position for DEP’s mobile inspection applications. The mobile inspection applications are being built on an iOS platform. The resulting data is received into DEP’s enterprise system via services. The backend database is Oracle 19C. This position will be responsible for serving as the designer, developer and/or engineer on multiple mobile inspection applications. They will work with the end user stakeholders at times, various Business Analysts (BAs) and Project Managers (PMs), and other technical staff in defining and managing the business and technical requirements. The candidate will be responsible for developing and/or engineering a user interface, a service tier, data tier components, and/or infrastructure or security for the mobile projects by working with the team leads.

Attention to reusable components and repeatable processes is required for developing the iOS solutions utilizing, but not limited to, Objective C, Swift, JSON, XML, and consumption of RESTful web services. The candidate will develop applications that link to a web service-oriented backend solution.

Additionally, a solid understanding and experience in Apple’s technologies is required, including but not limited to the distribution of certificates, provisioning profiles, code signing, keychains, push notifications, app transport requirements, and iOS version histories. The candidate should have a strong knowledge of iOS frameworks related to UI, Core Data, storyboards, web services, security/keychain, camera integration, asynchronous/background processing, multitasking, etc. Also, a strong understanding of MVC, delegation, target-action and Cocoa layers related to Touch, Media, OS and Services and Objective/C and iOS principles of memory management, notifications, blocks, categories, etc. is strongly helpful.

The ideal candidate will assist in project planning, including the development of timelines. They must understand Agile Scrum methodology and participate in daily standups. The selected candidate is expected to assist in the development and review of technical deliverables on the projects.

**Required/Desired Skills:**

Required - 6yrs - Full SDLC experience as an application developer

Required - 5yrs - Experience with object-oriented development

Required - 5yrs - Experience with iOS SDK and Objective-C

Required - 5yrs - Familiarity with Swift programming language and latest iOS APIs and frameworks

Required - 5yrs - Experience with Core Data framework

Required - 5yrs - Experience with relational database design and development

Required - 4yrs - Experience with iOS Auto Layout, Storyboard, Blocks and GCD

Required - 2yrs - Experience in architecting & solutioning mobile apps that consumes web services

**Desired Skills:**

Highly desired - 5yrs - Experience with deploying iOS apps

Highly desired - 1yrs - Experience in a team leadership position

Highly desired - 1yrs - Experience with deploying enterprise iOS apps via MDM

Highly desired - 5yrs - Experience with HTML5 development and JavaScript frameworks

Highly desired - 2yrs - Experience with Java centric server-side development and solutioning

title: AWS Developer
description:
About Telestream


For over 25 years, Telestream has been the undisputed trailblazer of innovation in the digital video industry. We craft cutting edge solutions for every facet of media processing and workflow orchestration. Whether it's the adrenaline-pumping live capture, seamless streaming, awe-inspiring production, or meticulous quality assurance of video content - Telestream stands as the unyielding force that ensures your video reaches audiences flawlessly, no matter how they are created, disseminated, or consumed.

  

Our roster of customers include most of the top Media & Entertainment, Video Production, Broadcasting and streaming companies in the world.

  

Now is the time for the next phase of Telestream's growth as we help our customers move to the next generation of video products and solutions that not only take advantage of traditional on premises solutions but are now moving to more hybrid and cloud based technologies and business solutions, while also incorporating AI into their video workflows.

 **AWS Developer - Remote, USA**

  

We are currently looking to hire an AWS developer who will play a crucial role in building scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud solutions using AWS services and features . If you're passionate about cloud technology and software development, this career path offers exciting challenges.

 **Responsibilities:**

* design cloud-based infrastructure
* monitor and troubleshoot
* facilitate root cause analysis to identify and fix issues that may arise
* ensure reliable monitoring systems to maintain health of platform and reduce downtime
* participate in on call rotation with any customer escalations that arise
* Strive to improve efficiency and sustainability by developing and implementing policies, standards and procedures for the work performed
* Communicate technical information to technical and non-technical staff across the organization and with customers

 **Qualifications:**

* BSc in Computer Science or equivalent
* Proficiency in programming language C#
* Hands-on experience with one or more public cloud providers as we deploy in all environments (AWS required) - (EC2, AWS Networking)
* strong background with SQL
* excellent communicator with the ability to deal with a wide range of internal and external resources
* self sufficient individual who possesses initiative to make decisions and solve a variety of technical issues
* Windows & Linux OS experience

title: Power Platform Developer
description:
Andworx is hiring a Power Platform Developer to provide expertise creating impactful and transformative solutions with the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages) in support of our company and our Federal Government Clients. As a candidate, you have strong technical skills with the ability to make visually pleasing low code/no code solutions and constructing rich data visualizations using the Microsoft Power Platform. You are highly organized and will be responsible for working with business subject matter experts and key stakeholders to understand customer business processes, objectives, and needs to provide timely and effective solutions. This is a dynamic position that will have high visibility within our company and requires the ability to perform a wide range of responsibilities.

  

Note: This position may require travel to the customer site near Washington, D.C., a few times a year.


**Requirements**


* Experience building technical solutions using the Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power BI, Power Automate, Power Pages, Dataverse etc.) or previous software development experience.
* Able to identify functional business requirements and satisfy business needs through design, development, testing and delivery of effective solutions.
* Ability to make solutions look good – attention to UX/UI design and solutions that are visually pleasing to users.
* Able to carry out assigned projects to their completion, establishing and maintaining effective working relationships with co-workers, customers, prospective customers, and vendors.
* Able to communicate clearly in spoken and written word to audiences with a wide variety of backgrounds and differing levels of technical expertise.
* Bachelor's Degree in a technical discipline, or the equivalent combination of education, professional training, work experience, or 4 years of direct experience providing the equivalency of a bachelor's degree.
* Active Secret clearance and ability to maintain a Secret clearance.
* US Citizenship is required.

**Preferred Qualifications**


* Microsoft Power Platform certifications such as:
+ Power Platform Fundamentals
+ Power Platform Functional Consultant
+ Power Platform Developer
+ Power Platform App Maker
+ Power Platform Solution Architect

* Experience integrating with industry leading cloud platforms.
* An eye for clean, easy to use, UI/UX implementations.
* An understanding of how to organize and present key data points through visualizations targeted at leadership.
* Prior experience supporting federal government customers.

**Responsibilities**


As a Microsoft Power Platform Developer, the candidate will leverage their blend of business analysis, organization, communication, and technical skills, to perform the following:


* Implement new solutions to business problems using the Power Platform and other applicable cloud platform solutions.
* Participate in project teams with subject matter experts and key stakeholders to understand customer business processes, objectives, and solution requirements.
* Contribute towards Microsoft Power Platform capability growth through coordination with team members and build out of capability demonstrators.
* Assist with contract proposal efforts both internally and with partner organizations.
* Troubleshoot, debug, maintain, and improve existing solutions.
* Understand high level data visualization needs to provide rich visualizations to leadership.
* Compile and assess user feedback to improve technical solutions.
* Identify and participate in community events relating to the Microsoft Power Platform.
* Perform other duties as assigned.

Andworx gets things done! We are a collaborative team of digital transformation experts and IT professionals who have an entrepreneurial mindset. We ignite the enthusiasm of our customers by delivering innovative, creative, and high-quality solutions, all paired with unparalleled services.  

  

We are a team of life-long learners who enjoy excelling, coaching, and mentoring. Together we celebrate our achievements and learn from our challenges as we grow through each experience as a team.  

  

**Additional Information**  

*Andworx is an Equal Opportunity Employer and provides equal employment opportunity to all individuals regardless of their race, color, creed, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law. Employment decisions are based solely on qualifications, merit and business need.*  

  

*Andworx participates in the E-Verify Employment Eligibility Verification Program.*

description:

ARC Group has an immediate opportunity for a React/NodeJS Developer! This position is 100% remote. This is starting out as a contract position running through July 2024 with strong potential to extend longer or possibly convert to FTE. This is a fantastic opportunity to join an established and well-respected organization offering tremendous career growth potential.  

  

At ARC Group, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected. We believe that diverse perspectives lead to better innovation and problem-solving. As an organization, we embrace diversity in all its forms and encourage individuals from underrepresented groups to apply.  

  

**100% REMOTE!**  

**Reference # 15152-1**  

  

**Candidates must have permanent work authorization and work for any employer without sponsorship now or in the future. Third party candidates are not eligible for this role.**  

  

Job Description:  

React Developers are responsible for the development, programming, and coding of Information Technology solutions using ReactJS, Redux, D3 and NodeJS to enable enterprise Customer Experience applications. They will engage in all phases of the software development lifecycle which include: gathering and analyzing user/business system requirements, responding to outages and creating application system models. Developers are responsible for documenting detailed system specifications and will participate in evaluating, conducting performance testing, and all planned and unplanned maintenance for both internally developed applications and purchased products. They will participate in design meetings and consult with clients to refine, test and debug programs to meet business needs and interact and sometimes direct third party partners in the achievement of business and technology initiatives. Developers are responsible for including IT Controls to protect the confidentiality, integrity, as well as availability of the application and data processed or output by the application.  

  

GENERAL REQUIREMENTS:  

* Experience with unit testing, release procedures, coding design and documentation protocol as well as change management procedures
* Proficiency using MERN and MEAN Scaffolding tools
* Must demonstrate initiative and effective independent decision-making skills
* Ability to communicate technical information clearly and articulately
* In-depth understanding of the systems development life cycle
* Proficiency programming in more than one object-oriented programming language; ReactJS, Node.JS, JavaScript, Express and HTML


o Proficiency with HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript/jQuery, local storage, and cross-browser compatibility are required  

o Experience with Mongo and Postgres databases  

* Experience with modern web/UI development tools and techniques: Node, Webpack, Grunt/Gulp, GIT, Axios, Jest


etc  

* Solid knowledge of DOM manipulation and client-side validation
* Solid knowledge with jQuery and other JavaScript libraries
* High critical thinking skills to evaluate alternatives and present solutions that are consistent with business objectives and strategy
* Experience with responsive grid systems
* Solid knowledge of React and Redux principals and build out

  

This position needs a strong backend developer with proficiency in the API development with Mongo and Postgres databases. Preferred skills: Python, Redis, Golang and LangChain skills.  

  

Required Work Experience:  

3+ years related work experience, Professional experience with technical design and coding in the IT industry  

  

Required Education:  

HS Diploma or GED

title: Senior Front-End Developer (React)
Full Stack Developer
description:
Eastern Research Group, Inc. (ERG) is a research and consulting firm that provides a wide range of support to federal, state, and commercial clients. ERG offers multidisciplinary teams with nationally recognized skills in engineering, science, economics, public health, informational technology, and communications. We hire people with the best minds and then provide them with a vibrant and flexible environment in which to develop their careers. The qualified individual must be highly motivated with the skills to prioritize, perform, and communicate effectively in a fast-paced environment.  

ERG is seeking experienced full-stack developers to join our digital solutions team. Interested candidates should submit a resume, cover letter, and include links to your LinkedIn profile, code repository, and any portfolio or other code samples.
### **Job Description:**

* Develop enterprise-scale software applications, working as part of a multi-disciplinary development team, to support the implementation of Federal policies and regulations that protect human health and the environment
* Implement system enhancements following requirements provided by subject matter experts
* Migrate legacy applications to modern technology stacks and cloud-based environments
* Assess and advise on technology options for application components
* Assist in integrating applications with Agency shared services that provide functionality such as authentication and data exchange
* Complete assigned tasks following an agile development framework, support development sprints, and use tools such as Jira and Confluence to track progress and maintain technical documentation
* Adheres to rigorous security best practices, maintains high coding standards, and follows meticulous deployment procedures
* Participate in agile/scrum team ceremonies and status meetings with clients

### **Qualifications and Skills:**

+ BA/BS (or minor) in Digital and Computational Studies, Computer Science, or related interdisciplinary majors or related fields (e.g., mathematics, science, engineering)

* 4-6 years of demonstrated development experience working on front-end, back-end, and database implementations
* Experience developing web applications using modern frameworks, such as React/Redux, Angular, or Vue.js
* Proficient in Node.js and familiar with common node frameworks
* Proficient in developing and programming databases, especially PostgreSQL
* Experience interfacing with databases using Object-Relational Mapping frameworks such as Hibernate, Entity Framework, and TypeORM
* Experience with Cloud architecture, such as AWS, Azure, or Cloud.gov
* Experience with RESTful API design and implementation
* Comfortable working in an Agile environment and using Lean/Agile delivery practices
* Experience using CI/CD tools and systems such as GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab, Bitbucket Pipelines, etc
* Possesses technical expertise, creativity, and a passion for architecting and implementing complex solutions with interests at staying at the forefront of technologies, such as AI
* Demonstrates curiosity and embraces continuous learning, proficiency in mastering new skills, and mentoring teammates.


ERG offers competitive salaries and excellent benefits, including health and dental insurance, life insurance, long-term disability, educational benefits, FSAs, a generous 401k plan, profit sharing, an EAP, 11-20 paid vacation days per year, 10 paid holidays per year, 56 hours or more of sick leave (based on the state you work in) per year (pro-rated for part-time) and more. The salary range for all positions depends on the years and type of experience.

ERG is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable EEOC and affirmative action regulations. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran. As such, successful candidates must be committed to working with diverse and inclusive teams.

Please be aware, the only authentic corporate domain for ERG is https://www.erg.com. ERG may, on occasion, screen applicants via telephone or video interviews via Skype, Teams, GoToMeeting, or another type of video platform. However, any candidate extended a job offer might be asked to meet in person with an ERG employee before providing confidential personal information associated with new employment.

If you’re a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you have the right to request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access ERG’s online application process as a result of your disability. To request accommodation, please contact Human Resources via email at Resumes-Lex@erg.com or call (781) 674-7293.

As ERG is a friendly, flexible, inclusive environment and has clients who are committed to making the world a better place, ERGers are incredibly dedicated. We promote and recognize principles of fairness, equity, and social justice in the work we do, the partnerships we foster, and the culture we value both within and outside of our organization.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
We are seeking to hire a DevOps Engineer with Docker/Kubernetes experience to support one of our long standing programs at one of the largest consumer electronics companies in the world:

**Required Qualifications:** 

**2+ years of experience in the following:** 

Ability to decompose User Stories into tasks and populate in ADO (Azure Devops)  
Configure and maintain AKS clusters, Nginx ingress controllers and Dapr service mesh.  
Write and maintain Dockerfiles, Helm charts and Azure pipelines to build and deploy .NET Core and NodeJS web applications to AKS clusters, Container Apps and Azure App Services.

**Responsibilities:**

· Ability to decompose User Stories into tasks and populate in ADO (Azure Devops)

· Exhibit a strong ability to quickly learn new technologies and provide guidance to other teams

· Work agnostically to deliver tasks from user stories on time and without defects

· Track effort on ongoing tasks and provide updates in daily stand-up to the project team

· Configure and maintain AKS clusters, Nginx ingress controllers and Dapr service mesh.

· Write and maintain Dockerfiles, Helm charts and Azure pipelines to build and deploy .NET Core and NodeJS web applications to AKS clusters, Container Apps and Azure App Services.

· Configure metrics and log-based monitoring, alerting and visualizations using Azure Monitor, Prometheus and Grafana.

· Import existing Azure infrastructure into Terraform and design and automate provisioning of new infrastructure solutions.

· Assist developers and SRE’s (Site Reliability Engineers) in troubleshooting application and infrastructure issues.

· Create and maintain wiki and markdown documentation.

· Write pipelines to package and distribute libraries and application installers.

**Preferred Requirements**

· Experience and knowledge of Project Management Tools – Such as ADO (Azure Dev Ops - preferred), or Jira

· Represent the development team in discussions with project team and stakeholders regarding DevOps approach

· Participate in code reviews of peer’s work product to provide feedback and identify defects

· Ability to effectively operate and drive results in undefined and highly ambiguous scenarios

· Strong analytical skills, combined with a strategic orientation, as well as an aptitude for solving complex business problems.

· Technical problem-solving and skills using data analysis and escalation management in a complex environment.

· Experience managing projects with multiple work streams and partners; demonstrated strategic planning abilities.

· Effective communication and interpersonal skills with proven ability to impact & influence key stakeholders.

· Demonstrated ability to identify cross-team differences, lead a positive collaboration and resolve issues.

· Experience with Dapr or other Kubernetes service mesh.

· Experience configuring Kubernetes admission controllers to enforce security policies.

· Familiarity with advanced Kubernetes autoscaling techniques such as KEDA and cluster overprovisioning.

· Experience with private Kubernetes clusters and GitOps deployment model.

title: Front End Engineer
description:
A BIT ABOUT US


We're at the forefront of one of the most exciting evolutions of our generation - remote staffing. No longer do employers have to hire according to geography, and no longer do employees have to worry about proximity to work and daily commutes. Today, companies can hire the best talent they can find, anywhere in the world. But they need digital solutions to help them streamline the process...


Welcome to Multiplier! Our global employment platform empowers companies to hire people all across the world by managing the complexities of local compliance, labour contracts, payroll, benefits and taxes - all from one software system. It's a game changer!


We're on a mission to impact economies of scale by enabling companies to hire the best candidate for the job, regardless of location. We're backed by some of the best in the game (Sequoia and Golden Gate Ventures), led by domain level experts, growing, and seeking brilliant like minded enthusiasts to join our team.


**What will I be doing?**


* Championing the customer facing product development from inception to launch, and own large parts of the product and its features.
* Working closely with our product and design teams to build products with the goal of delighting and increasing the success of our customers, in a very iterative fashion.
* Architecting, building, testing, and releasing features with the highest quality.
* Automating everything that an engineer should not work on

**What do I need?**

* 3+ years of industry experience in a similar engineering role, preferably building a SaaS product. You can demonstrate significant impact that your work has had on the product and/or the team.
* Deep knowledge of a Javascript and web fundamentals with strong proficiency in CSS/HTML. Having exposure to TypeScript would a good as well.
* Highly skilled in one or more Front End stacks (which include React, VueJS, Svelte, Angular etc). but it doesn't need to be a stack that we use here! Great people are effective and learn what we use quickly (or introduce us to better ways of working)
* Understanding of testing, build process, deployment and effective delivery of Front End applications over the cloud.
* Willingness to quickly learn and use new technologies or frameworks.
* Extremely data-driven.
* Work with and solve problems of very complex nature and enjoy doing it

Feel free to apply even if you feel unsure about whether you meet every single requirement in this posting. As long as you're a quick learner, and are excited about changing the status quo for tech recruitment, we're happy to support you as you come up to speed with our tech stack.


**Perks**


* Flexible vacation.
* Flexible work times.
* Work from anywhere.
* Equipment you need to do your job
* Health Insurance
* Attractive ESOPs

What our selection process looks like


* Initial screening round.
* Technical round with our engineers.
* Technical Interview with our CTO
* Meet the Founders

**Equal employment opportunity**


Multiplier is an equal opportunity employer: we value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**TITLE:** Full Stack Developer  
**TYPE:** Full-Time  
**LOCATION:** REMOTE - *Preference for candidates in Washington, D.C., Northern Virginia and San Antonio* 

**COMPANY OVERVIEW**

SteerBridge Strategies is a CVE-Verified Service Disabled, Veteran Owned Small Business, (SDVOSB) providing a wide array of professional services to the U.S. Government and private sector. We leverage decades of federal acquisition and procurement experience to deliver best in class commercial solutions for government agencies while maximizing veteran talent.

**POSITION OVERVIEW**

SteerBridge Strategies is supporting a national-level program for the Veterans Benefits Administration (“VBA”) to modernize its delivery of educational benefits to Veterans. The Digital GI Bill (DGIB) is a top priority for our strategic partner, Accenture Federal Services (AFS). As partners, SteerBridge and AFS are looking for the most talented IT professionals to join this dynamic, multi-year opportunity.

The VBA is responsible for administering the department's programs that provide financial and other forms of assistance to veterans, their dependents, and survivors. Claims are currently processed at Regional Processing Offices by Claims Examiners. The VBA envisions improved customer service and mission accomplishment by digitizing the process. This project will provide a user-friendly service for beneficiaries to apply, withdraw, amend, transfer or perform other actions with improved timeliness and accuracy of award decisions. Due to the technical deficit in the VBA’s application and IT infrastructure, implementing these changes will be challenging and under an aggressive timeline.

**LOCATION**

* This is a REMOTE position.
* Candidates are expected to travel for co-located working sessions (approximately 10-12 times a year) to AFS office in Chantilly, VA, or other locations as needed.
* Preference for candidates local to Washington, D.C., Northern Virginia, and San Antonio.

**REQUIRED**

* Must be a US Citizen, Dual Citizen, or Green Card Holder (Permanent Resident).
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Electronics Engineering or other Engineering or Technical discipline is required plus a minimum of five (5) years of related work experience. Eight (8) years of may be substituted for education, for a total of thirteen (13) years of work experience.
* Must be able to pass a Public Trust background check.
* Travel to the AFS office in Chantilly, VA, or other locations as needed.
* Must be able to work East Coast business hours.

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE / QUALIFICATIONS**

* Must have experience in analyzing customer needs and developing overall concept and design objectives.
* Must be able to create software in a variety of programming and for a variety of IT software applications.
* Must have experience in debugging and correcting errors in computer programs.

**TECHNICAL SKILLS**

* Consuming data via service integration (i.e. REST and/or SOAP APIs)
* Developing for Section 508 and WCAG 2.x compliance
* Quality assurance unit testing integration
* CI/CD processes and tools including Jenkins, Git/BitBucket, SonarQube
* Experience with MEAN/DEAN (Mongo/Dynamo, Express, Angular, Node) stack
* Experience with Eclipse/VSCode/IntelliJ/NetBeans/FireBug/Chrome development tools
* Experience with databases, SQL, data modeling
* Experience with performance tuning
* Experience with mobile (IOS, Android) and hybrid frameworks (Ionic, Titanium, etc.)
* Experience with Agile (SCRUM, Kanban), Standard SDLC, CMMI compliant projects
* Experience with issue tracking software (e.g. JIRA, BugZilla, Rational Suite)
* Experience with Quality Assurance code quality frameworks (e.g. SonarQube, OWASP)
* Experience with source control management (SVN, GIT, Mercurial, CVS)
* Experience with build/continuous integration (Maven, Ant, Grunt, Gulp, Node/NPM, Webpack, etc.

**COMPENSATION**

(Starting from $140,000.00) A salary commensurate with background and experience will be offered.

**BENEFITS**

* Health insurance
* Dental Insurance
* Vision Insurance
* Life insurance
* 401(k) with matching
* Paid Time Off
* Paid Federal Holidays

*SteerBridge Strategies is committed to equal employment opportunity and nondiscrimination for all employees and qualified applicants without regard to a person’s race, color, gender, age, religion, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, or any characteristic protected under applicable law. SteerBridge Strategies will make reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with known disabilities in accordance with applicable law.*

title: Full Stack Web Developer (JR633)
description:
**Position Summary:** We are seeking a passionate and skilled Full-Stack Web Developer to join our growing team and play a key role in building innovative and engaging web applications. You will work on challenging projects, leveraging your expertise in modern web development technologies and your comfort with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to deliver high-quality solutions. This is an exciting opportunity for a self-motivated developer to contribute to a fast-paced environment and collaborate with a talented team.

This incumbent brings an entrepreneurial spirit, independent and creative thinking, and leadership through collaboration and influence.

**Responsibilities:**

**Front-End Development:**

* Design and develop intuitive and user-friendly interfaces using modern frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Implement responsive design principles to ensure excellent user experience across all devices.
* Craft reusable components and maintain clean, well-documented code.

**Back-End Development:**

* Build secure and scalable back-end systems using languages like Python, Node.js, or Go.
* Design and implement APIs using RESTful principles for seamless integration.
* Utilize databases (relational or NoSQL) to store and manage data effectively.

**Cloud Expertise (GCP):**

* Design and deploy applications on GCP using services like App Engine, Compute Engine, or Cloud Functions.
* Leverage Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL, and other relevant services to manage data and infrastructure.
* Implement continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines for efficient deployments.

**Collaboration and Growth:**

* Work closely with designers, product managers, and other developers to translate ideas into working solutions.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in web development and cloud technologies.
* Share your knowledge and mentor junior developers within the team.

**Qualifications:**

**Essential:**

* 2+ years of experience as a full-stack web developer.
* Proficiency in modern web development languages (JavaScript, HTML, CSS).
* Familiarity with at least one major front-end framework (React, Angular, Vue.js).
* Comfort with at least one back-end language (Python, Node.js, Go).
* Understanding of database management concepts (relational or NoSQL).
* Working knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and at least one relevant service (App Engine, Compute Engine, Cloud Functions, etc.).
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

**Desirable:**

* Experience with API development and integration.
* Knowledge of CI/CD tools and methodologies.
* Experience with DevOps practices.
* Certifications in web development or GCP technologies.

**Personal Competencies:**

**Critical Thinking** - actively and skillfully conceptualizing, applying, analyzing, synthesizing, and/or evaluating information gathered from, or generated by, observation, experience, reflection, reasoning, or communication, as a guide to belief and action.

**Conflict Resolution** – The ability to find a peaceful solution to a disagreement.

**Communication –** The ability to communicate clearly, concisely, and concretely in writing and verbally in a positive manner to foster the sharing of knowledge.

**Active Listening** – The ability to keep you engaged with your conversation partner in a positive way. The process of listening attentively while someone else speaks, paraphrasing and reflecting back what is said, and withholding judgment and advice.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
WHO WE ARE
  
At RunAsYouAre our purpose is to bring happiness to every runner in the world. We strive to cultivate change in run and create a culture of diversity and sustainability by inspiring communities and contributing to a better world in everything we do.
  
Our goal is to provide an outstanding experience for our people, our customers and our crew.
  
  

THE ROLE
  
As Full Stack Developer of RunAsYouAre, you’ll shape the future of our product, building cutting-edge technology to deliver an elevated digital and health experience for runners. You’ll be focused on building our recently launched e-commerce platform, connecting our users to a global running ecosystem, and engineering a fully integrated retail tech stack.
  
  

The Software Developer will be responsible for working across the tech stack to build core infrastructure and services, such as integrating e-commerce with state-of-the-art inventory management systems, building a gamified running experience, and developing re-usable backend and front-end components. This person will work closely with the product management and design team in evolving our technical foundation, planning and building new features, solving unique customer problems, and collaborating with a small-but-mighty group of developers with a variety of backgrounds and expertise.
  
  

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
  
* Building and designing our core platform, from database schemas to API designs.
* Optimizing and configuring fast and scalable solutions for our e-commerce platform as our customer base grows and our product evolves.
* Writing React + Node.js code to develop adaptive web applications.
* Implementing the logic behind our RunReady platform.
* Integrate third-party data sources to build a robust digital ecosystem for runners.
* Build admin-facing tools and front-end experiences to manage user experiences.
* Establish best practices and define processes for our engineering team to grow and succeed.


WHO YOU ARE
  
* Honest, fair, and ethical
* Scrappy and determined mindset
* Desire to build scalable, secure, and efficient code.
* Use logic and reasoning to build customer-first digital solutions.
* Tolerates uncertainty and ambiguity and can change priorities.
* Thinks independently and can offer creative and strategic solutions for growth and advancement of the company.
* Have a passion for excellence and continuous improvement.
* Willing to explore new technologies, and step outside your comfort zone.
* A strong communicator that works collaboratively with our product, engineering, and designs teams.
* Not afraid to ask for help or additional guidance when needed, you’ll have a team willing to support you.


POSITION REQUIREMENTS
  
MUST HAVE'S
  
* Experience writing React, Node.js, and Python in a professional setting.
* Ability to understand and execute on product requirements.
* Comfortable working across the tech stack, integrating backend APIs with front-end experiences.
* Experience unit/integration testing and deploying code to production.
* Experience with NoSQL databases in production.
* Proficiency working in Cloud Environments (AWS/GCP).
* Able to work autonomously and make decisions independently
* Must be legally authorized to work in Canada
* Must be 18 years of age or older
* Willing to work a flexible schedule when required
* Willing to work as part of a team and also complete work independently


NICE TO HAVE'S
  
* You run!
* Knowledge of Firebase, Next.js, is not required but nice to have.
* Experience unit/integration testing and solid understanding of GIT.
* Familiarity with Shopify and other third-party APIs.
* Experience working in Agile framework.
* Familiar with AI and ML data and test pipelines and strategies.


COMPENSATION
  
Compensation will include a competitive base salary, plus bonus opportunities and other perks and benefits.
  
  

Please email Larry Lau at dev@runasyouare.co (https://rob@runasyouare.co/) with resume and cover letter explaining why you feel you would be good for this role.
